function.name: function_name
function.description: <description of what the function does>. <suggestions on when to call the function>

parameters.type: <input type> e.g. object, integer, string. Need to do 'properties' if object

first_object_key.description: <description of the input parameter> e.g 'temperature in celsius'

required: list of required parameters. If none, leave empty or don't include this key
